body.name: Oxford Baby Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib, Rustic White, GreenGuard Gold Certified
features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

EXQUISITE STYLING: The Bennett Crib boasts rustic elegance and timeless style with its beautifully and carefully crafted wainscoting detail, bold lines, beveled raised accents, flat, high-back full panel straight-line headboard and has a smooth to the touch surface

SUPERIOR QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: Designed to fit a standard-size crib mattress, this 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient design that will grow as your baby grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: GreenGuard Gold Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
body.description: Create a warm and welcoming nursery with the Bennett Collection by Oxford Baby. Made from solid woods and wood veneers this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby.The Bennett Crib boasts rustic elegance and timeless style with its beautifully and carefully crafted wainscoting detail, bold lines, beveled raised accents, flat, high-back full panel straight-line headboard and is finished with a sophisticated wire brushed texture. Thoughtfully designed to fit a standard-sized crib mattress, this Oxford Baby 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child.The Bennett Collection by Oxford Baby in Rustic White features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12811480), 3-Drawer Dresser (12333480), Changing Topper (12363480), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (12395480), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (12388480), and Oxford Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately. The Bennett Collection is available in Rustic White and Rustic Gray finishes which complement many design and décor aesthetics.This full-size Oxford Baby Crib arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly (screwdriver not included but required to assemble). The crib measures 55.88 in. W x 29.88 in. D x 43.50 in. H (63.9 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 50 pounds when used as a crib, toddler bed, or day bed and 400 pounds when converted to a full-size bed. Plus, this crib is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty.The Oxford Baby Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greenguard Gold Certified Tested for over 10,000 chemicals and VOC's, ensuring that your little one is sleeping in a safe and healthy environment. 3 Adjustable Height Settings Thoughtfully designed to lower as your baby crawls, sits, and stands. The mattress support will lower to accommodate your child's growing needs. Superior Construction Oxford Baby cribs are made from the finest materials for durability, and sourced from sustainable forests.

Bennett Crib The Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Crib grows with your child over time for long-lasting value. Bennett Toddler Bed The Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Crib adapts into a grand toddler bed; this stage teaches your child to get in and out of bed on their own. Toddler Guard Rail sold separately. Bennett Day Bed For added versatility, the Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a day bed. Bennett Full Size Bed The Bennett 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a spacious full size bed for your little one. Full Bed Conversion Kit sold separately.
Nolan Guard Rail Bennett Full Bed Conversion Kit Bennett 3 Drawer Dresser Bennett Changing Topper Nolan Changing Station Available on Amazon ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the Crib! It was easy to assemble alone it is sturdy and fits nicely in our nursery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy crib for the price
reviews.reviewText: Overall this crib is sturdy and cute. The only downside is the variation in color being “rustic” white, the headboard had slight color variation to it it was not just flat even white. Was a tad difficult to put together but once together it is very sturdy and looks great in the nursery
